name: 全本小说网
comment: 只能搜老书，搜索需加密参数b，有时很卡甚至打不开网站

search.data: {keywords: %s, a: search.json, b: %s, c: book, callback: search}
search.author: p.info > span

book.author: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(3) > span
book.category: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(4) > span
book.coverUrl: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > div > img
book.isEnd: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(5) > span
